data.title: The writer and historian Cari Beauchamp died last week at 74 years old. Beauchamp was an Alta Journal contributor, writing about a cold war...
data.meta_description:
42 likes, 0 comments - altajournal on December 23, 2023: "The writer and historian Cari Beauchamp died last week at 74 years old. Beauchamp was an Alta Journal contributor, writing about a cold war mystery involving Marilyn Monroe for Issue 5.

Among her books were "Without Lying Down: Frances Marion and the Powerful Women of Early Hollywood," "Joseph P. Kennedy Presents: His Hollywood Years," and "Hollywood on the Riviera: The Inside Story of the Cannes Film Festival."

Alta editor and publisher Will Hearst offers a fond remembrance of Beauchamp for this week's Weekend Read, as we revisit her writing. Tap the link in our bio to read it.
